reviews.sentence: Well kept older unit. The bathroom was really narrow and a. Well kept older unit. The bathroom was really narrow and a large person could have a problem with the width of the shower door.

Old School motel done well. let us put the four star Very Good rating in perspective This Travelodge does what it sets out to do very weldo not let the La Jola address fool you. this property is not located in the heart of downtown La Jola where room prices are significantly higher. It is located on the outskirts of La Jola near Bird Rock. Getting to either will require transportation. In typical motel fashion the rooms wrap around the free parking lot. Friendly desk staff helped us find our way to our second floor room which we accessed via an outdoor stairway off the parking lot. Room was standard with modestly small bathroom. In wall AC unit was a bit noisy but not a big deal in San Diego climate. We did not take advantage of the included breakfast or use the outdoor pool. Travelodge is an old school motel done well just do not expect a high end travel experience.

In an area of very expensive lodging we found this motel to be a real Gem. There is an atmosphere of We care about you from the front desk service to the rooms themselves. We were in La Jola for medical appointments at the Scripps Institute and were overwhelmed by the rates being charged everywhere even with the Scripps discounts. This motel is about a 20 minute drive more in rush hour we found from the Scripps facility but is worth the extra time if you have it. We made the short walk to the beautiful waterfront and enjoyed the white sandy beaches the surfers and activity there. Across the street from our room was a terrific Mexican restaurant with a 20 discount in the dining room coupons available at the desk and great Happy Hour prices in the lounge. We had a comfortable king size bed in an end room on the second floor and is was pretty quiet. You can hear TVs from other rooms occasionally. Our bathroom was minuscule but we looked at a double Q room which was much more spacious so the rooms do vary. Breakfast in the lobby no seating was simple pastries and cereals and fresh apples and oranges coffee tea. We had coffee maker in the room table and chairs tv. We would definitely return.

Great location just a block from the beach. However the Great location just a block from the beach. However the rooms esp the bathroom were outdated and need to be renovated. The AC unit was old and noisy.

Enjoyable and relaxing stay in a beautiful location. The location is what makes this hotel as it is so near to a beautiful beach within 5 mins walk. The hotel was comfy and clean but somewhat dated. Bathroom was clean but had seen better days. A refurb needed to make it really good. Good complementary continental breakfast that you could take to you room. Staff very welcoming and friendly. The Mandarin Chinese restaurant across the road was excellent. Local bus possible into town very near La Jola shores with nice restaurants and bars overlooking the ocean. Get sun setsAlthough advertised with pool it was tiny and frankly it did not look clean. It was also in a very small space and not particularly enticing.
Freindly staff great prices free continental breakfast from 7 to 10. Fridge and microwave in room.

Two night stay. The Travelodge is located close to the beach in the La Jola neighbourhood nice for going to swim or a run in the morning. Some restaurants and a small supermarket 7Eleven are located close by. The rather busy street quiets down at night. The personal was exceptionally friendly and helpful. Compared to a typical US motel breakfast the breakfast was quite rich. At the moment there is some renovation going on. Parking space is somewhat limited and there may be some noise during the day. But it did not feel disturbed by it and I always appreciate improvements being made to the rooms. Right now the interior starts looking dated but that should be gone soon.

A budget motel that is very well located. It is very near to Windnsea beach and around 15 20 minutes walk to downtown La Jola. I guess that you get what you pay for and the room was small and basic but adequately equipped. A continental breakfast was provided but they do not tell you that you have to eat it in your room or by the pool. The building is currently undergoing a lot of building work and the reception area is temporarily housed in one of the accommodation units. There is no dining room at present. The other minor gripe is the very tight parking space at the back of the building. We parked an average sized car and somebody parked a Ford Mustang next to us. We had to manoeuvre back and forth around eight times to get the car out. The reception staff were bearing up to the difficulty very well and were cheerful and helpful. Full marks thereIf you want cheap plain and simple accommodation that is well located then the Travelodge will fit the bill. If your budget stretches to bigger and better there are several other establishments in La Jola.

Staff was great. Very charming hotel. The courtyard is Great. Stayed in a double queen room saw and the woman cleaning a king room that was vacant we asked if we could take a peak and she was so sweet and kind she let us see the setup. My only complaint is that the bathroom is so small you can not close the door and fit in bathroom comfortably. anyone over 56 would have a problem. Oh and they were painting the courtyard furniture and it was not dry so we wound up with paint on our clothes. But I would definitely stay there again.

Very clean and good location. I loved the cleanliness of the room. Hardwood floors and a very nice bathroom made for a great stay. The price was a bit high for the size of the room but I booked only a few days in advance during peak booking times in summer so it ’s to be expected.
Nicely remodeled with modern look feel ie large wall mounted tv. Clean room comfortable bed very friendly staff. No fee parking location made it a great value.
Nicely remodeled with modern look feel ie large wall mounted tv. Clean room comfortable bed very friendly staff. No fee parking location made it a great value.

This place exceeded my expectations. It is exactly as it looks a revamped motel. they have done an amazing job at equipping the rooms with every modern comfort super fast and free. WiFi mini fridge microwave safe top quality shampoos soaps hairdryer. it is all here in a super stylish room with an ultra comfy bed. Location is unbeatable a 3minute walk to a super special beach with direct access and an adjacent walking path. Bikes are available too. The pool looked cute although I did not have a chance to use it work trip. The best part. The very friendly accommodating staff. do not hesitate. book The Shoal La Jola it is likely the best overall value in the area.
Perfect for my needs. Bed is very comfortable roomy shower great friendly staff will definitely be back.

For the economical traveler this place is awesome. Do n’t be scared off by the “ motel ” look. all the rooms have a newly renovated modern feel and are super clean. Rooms are supplied with large shampoo conditioner and lotion bottles in the room as well. The location is great 3 minutes from the Windansea beach. Just a short drive to the cove area and dining options. The staff was so friendly and accommodating the free beach towels and chair rentals were helpful. We had a very late flight leaving and were able to pay for only a half day and check out at 7 pm prior to our flight it was a life saver. Love this place. Make sure to check their site for the cheapest rates 99 night in Feb.
Great staff spacious clean rooms very comfortable bed.

This hotel was big and comfy and the restroom inside the hotel room was very bright and pretty ♥ ️ One thing though is that he outside appearance did not fully make up to my expectations. The main photo shows the lobby portion of the hotel so it would be better to keep that in mind.

Our first stay at The Shoal we thought it was a very nice large room. Great shower plenty of hot water. For us The most Comfy beds. The staff was very nice helped us with something we needed to have printed out. We definitely would choose to stay here on our next visit. Close to the beach and great breakfast place right next door. Definitely worth five stars.

Our first stay at The Shoal we thought it was a very nice large room. Great shower plenty of hot water. For us The most Comfy beds. The staff was very nice helped us with something we needed to have printed out. We definitely would choose to stay here on our next visit. Close to the beach and great breakfast place right next door. Definitely worth five stars.
